name: Vikas Ashok
content: Vikas Ashok Vikas Ashok Vikas G Ashok Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science E&CS Bldg., Room 3107 Old Dominion University Norfolk, VA 23529 Email: vganjigu AT cs DOT odu DOT edu Office Phone: (757) 683-7797 Twitter, Linkedin ABOUT TEACHING Brief BioBefore joining Old Dominion University, I was a post-doctoral associate at Stony Brook University, from where I graduated with a PhD in Computer Science. My primary research focus is in Accessible Computing, and I am particularly interested in designing and developing AI-driven assistive technologies for people with vision impairments. Research Please visit my lab page for full research info: Accesible Computing Lab Spring 2024: CSE 733 Natural Language Processing
